nodes.text: Surronian Farstars were starships that predated the Galactic Empire. By 1 ABY, they were collector's items. Lando Calrissian had three in his used starship lot on Nar Shaddaa which he decisively wagered against the Cloud City in his Sabacc game with the corrupt Baron Administrator Dominic Raynor, who recognized that their value was worth betting his position against.
